# Alignment Control the alignment of content within containers using align and valign attributes. ## Horizontal Alignment `view .html [ row [ align: 'left text "Left" ] row [ align: 'center text "Center" ] row [ align: 'right text "Right" ] ]` ## Vertical Alignment `view .html [ row [ valign: 'top text "Top" ] row [ valign: 'middle text "Middle" ] row [ valign: 'bottom text "Bottom" ] ]` ## Alignment Values - **Horizontal**: left, center, right, justify - **Vertical**: top, middle, bottom ## See Also - [Spacing & Padding](/wiki/core/layout/spacing-pad/) - Spacing control - [Origin & Offset](/wiki/core/layout/origin-offset/) - Positioning control
